name: A.N.M Zakaria Shahed
title: Senior Manager, Software Quality Assurance
summary: A seasoned SQA professional with over 9 years of experience in manual testing, automation, and penetration testing. Currently working as a Senior Manager, leading a 40+ member QA team at TechnoNext (a sister concern of US-Bangla Airlines). Skilled in Selenium, Playwright, TestNG, Jenkins, SDLC/STLC, and bug bounty programs. ISTQB Certified and a published bug hunter on HackerOne.

responsibilities: Leading and managing a QA team of over 40 members
Overseeing QA for platforms like Foodi, Cartup, and Firsttrip
Designing and implementing test automation frameworks using Selenium and Playwright
Guiding penetration testing team for secure application development
Enforcing best practices in SDLC and STLC
Wrote and managed automation test scripts
Created QA strategy and managed releases
Led a QA team of 12 testers
Conducted API automation, performance testing with Locust
Performed manual testing and led QA in SCRUM environments

certifications.name: Software Testing and Test Plan Execution
Understanding Docker and Using It for Selenium Automation

Zakaria is a passionate and sharp QA engineer, considered among the top ten automation engineers in our company.

Technically sound and extraordinarily talented in test automation. Zakaria is innovative and maintains high quality under pressure.
